Package ca.gc.cra.radar.config

package ca.gc.cra.radar.config
Runtime configuration structures and composition root wiring for RADAR CLIs.

Provides immutable configuration aggregates and builders that describe IO and adapter selection, and exposes factory methods to assemble application use cases.

Since:
RADAR 0.1-doc
  • Class
    Description
    AssembleConfig
    Configuration for the assemble CLI pipeline.
    CaptureConfig
    Configuration for the capture CLI, covering NIC selection, IO modes, and file rotation.
    CaptureConfig.PersistenceQueueType
    Queue implementations available for live persistence hand-off.
    CapturePropertiesLoader
    Utility for loading CaptureConfig from Java Properties streams.
    CaptureProtocol
    Capture protocol hints used to select sensible defaults for packet filtering.
    CompositionRoot
    Temporary composition root used while migrating to the new architecture.
    Config
    Immutable runtime configuration shared across RADAR CLIs.
    ConfigLoader
    Loads Config instances from configuration files.
    IoMode
    IO strategies available to RADAR pipelines.
    PosterConfig
    Configuration for poster pipelines that render reconstructed protocol traffic.
    PosterConfig.DecodeMode
    Controls how aggressively poster pipelines decode transfer/content encodings.
    PosterConfig.ProtocolConfig
    Per-protocol poster configuration covering file and Kafka targets.
